content: as in round 11 round 20 *chain 4 1 single_crochet in next ch5 space and repeat from * round 21 *chain 3 1 single_crochet in the next ch4 space and repeat from * round 22 *chain 2 1 single_crochet in the next ch3 space and repeat from * round 23 repeat round 22 round 24 *single_crochet in the next single_crochet place marker 2 single_crochet in the next ch2 space and repeat from * you should have 108 single_crochet when you complete the round round 25 this is your final round and will include making the handles and attaching them to the body of the bag 1 single_crochet into the next 33 single_crochet chain 48 single_crochet into each chain heading back towards the body of the bag you will have 47 single_crochet single_crochet in the next 21 single_crochet and attach the other side of the handle to the beginning of the round with 2 single_crochet slip_stitch in the next single_crochet and fasten_off you can use the tail to secure your handle you can untwist the twine and weave in the strands individually finishing pull the long tail at the center of your bag tight split the twine and weave in the strands individually load up your bag and go shopping care instructions hand or machine wash air dry level of difficulty easy www knittedmoondesigns com 3
